home.welcome:
Ah, you've arrived, {0}. I couldn't help but notice how busy you are these days...
If you could manage to find the time to sit and enjoy an opera together or share a pot of tea... Taking a moment to slow down and enjoy the finer things in life is always beneficial to your body and soul.

index.s0: (Translated) How gently do the clouds and flowers sway, as dancing winds meander through the vales.
